00030 #ifndef ODECONVERGENCETESTER_HPP_
00031 #define ODECONVERGENCETESTER_HPP_
00032 
00033 #include "AbstractConvergenceTester.hpp"
00037 template<class CELL, class CARDIAC_PROBLEM, unsigned DIM, unsigned PROBLEM_DIM>
00038 class OdeConvergenceTester : public AbstractConvergenceTester<CELL, CARDIAC_PROBLEM, DIM, PROBLEM_DIM>
00039 {
00040 public:
00044     void SetInitialConvergenceParameters()
00045     {
00046         this->PdeTimeStep = 2e-2;
00047         this->OdeTimeStep = 1e-2;
00048     }
00052     void UpdateConvergenceParameters()
00053     {
00054         this->OdeTimeStep *= 0.5;
00055 
00056     }
00060     bool GiveUpConvergence()
00061     {
00062         return this->OdeTimeStep<=1e-5;
00063     }
00067     double Abscissa()
00068     {
00069         return this->OdeTimeStep;
00070     }
00071 
00072 };
00073 #endif /*ODECONVERGENCETESTER_HPP_*/
